creator: diniox@o2.pl
text:
Apache should have default MIME application/octet-stream not text/plain, because
is less-bugable (some web show characters instead download for example *.rar).

I don't really see the need for a separate bug for 2.0 here, so let's
group this with the 1.3 bug.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14095 ***
creator: slive@apache.org
